fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Business and Industry, Single market, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Digital economy and society, Transport, Borders and Security
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication: Participation in FP7 and Horizon 2020 projects.
goals__remit: Vision-Box® is committed to becoming the world’s leading company supporting governments, border control authorities, airports or all organizations that need to improve their security, by offering them superior, tailor-made, border control identity management and security solutions that excel in dependability, innovation and value creation, bring the best technological experience to people and organizations, and enhancing the collective values of security, safety, efficiency and convenience.
